hero: Providing investors with access to Real Assets with Real Returns.
heroSub: A real-estate focused fund manager delivering premium investment opportunities in real estate that generate exceptional risk-adjusted returns from developments that contribute to thriving communities.
aboutSub: Elite Capital is a DFSA-authorised private equity firm, offering international investors access to attractive investment opportunities in Real Assets by combining in-depth local knowledge with global fund management and strategic investment expertise. Our success is built on creating long-lasting partnerships with our investors to offer Real Assets with Real Returns.

stats.text: Real estate projects exclusive to Elite Capital
in equity required for Elite Capital’s exclusive pipeline

values.valueContent: We strive to be the partner of choice for investors, developers and communities, building strong relationships that deliver long-term solutions and success.
With 80+ years of combined experience, we are committed to the highest standards of transparency, honesty and ethics in all our business dealings.

We combine deep local knowledge with global investment expertise to ensure our investment strategies are innovative, data-driven and reliable. Our team consistently delivers a best-in-class approach to seeking superior risk-adjusted returns.
We build and maintain trust through transparency, consistency and collaboration in our dealings with all our stakeholders.
We invest in responsibly designed developments to deliver lasting environmental and social benefits to communities.

advantage.text: Canada stands out as a prime investment destination in the G7 due to its fast-growing, stable economy, abundant natural resources, AAA credit rating, rapidly rising population, and high housing demand. Canada's population is forecast to grow 11.6 million by 2050.
This rapid growth, combined with a projected housing shortage of over 3.5 million homes by 2030,makes the Canadian residential real estate market a highly attractive investment opportunity.

diversifyHead: Diversify your portfolio with highly attractive Canadian real estate

diversify.text: Our investors can access varied investment opportunities including our exclusive pipeline of 45+ premium, community-centred developments in Ontario, Canada. This pipeline includes many purpose-built developments for the rental market that have gone through an extensive development and permitting process and are shovel ready.
This exclusive pipeline of investment opportunities, combined with our thorough due diligence and hands-on asset management is geared to deliver superior risk adjusted returns to our investors.

portfolioHead: Our select pipeline of investment opportunities
portfolioSub: Diversified portfolio of purpose-built residential developments in Ontario
contactSub: Contact us to learn more about our investment opportunities.
